info.brief_description: You (any of 3 povs) get possessed by someone you know or a stranger!
info.description:
You are sitting at home one day, when suddenly a chill runs down your back and you are possessed by someone! You do not know who you are possessed by - a friend, a stranger, or even a family member! All you know is that you are hopeless to whatever they are going to do in your body, clean or not.

Let's keep this story going! Please add if you like it! Thank you all!!


Some Rules

- The POV of the person must initially remain in that of the one being controlled. We can hear the inner thoughts of the one possessing, but this story is about the one being possessed.
- If the possessor leaves the initial character's body, the POV may change. Just remember to change the POV.
- The possessor can hop from body to body.
- This story is based around a body control type possession, so the person possessed must at least have some recollection of what they were doing while possessed.
- Other than that, go crazy! Just keep it relatively tame, nothing underaged.

Characters in your family who can get possessed!

Daniel Harmon - An 18 year old boy, normal looking, not too buff, skinny. Mildly popular.

Joyce Harmon - Daniel's younger sister, best friends to Daniel, 17 years old, quite good looking, C cup boobs, nothing extremely special but still quite good looking. Pretty popular but not insanely popular. Blonde.

Jenna Harmon -Daniel and Joyce's adopted 21 year old British sister, she is very good looking, she was adopted at age 9 because her parents both sadly abandoned her, and the Harmon family decided to take her in. She is a very nice and caring girl and is a friend to both of her siblings. D cup boobs, overall very good looking.

Characters in your family who can possess!

Tyler Harmon -Daniel and Jenna's biological sibling who the rest of you despise. He is 16 years old, and your average looking jerky nerd. He is quite mean, angry, and plays video games all day. He is not that good looking.

Gabriella Harmon -The family mother. She is 38, and is quite frankly a MILF! She is very good looking, still looking in her twenties with D cup boobs and whom Joyce inherited some of her looks.

Characters outside your family who can possess!

Sandra Mali-Daniel's girlfriend, a short but skinny and beautiful nice girl who loves Daniel. Many people wish they had her, but only you do. The rest of your family also enjoy her. 18 years old.

Gary Hartman -Daniel's best friend. A bit of a weirdo, but very fun to be around. Looks very much like Daniel to the point of people confusing them. Is quite nice, but is a bit of a perv. 18 Years old as well.

Theresa Peck - 21 year old best friend of Jenna, she is quite cocky and mean to everyone in your family except Jenna. No one really likes her, but they tolerate her. She is a bit of a bimbo.

Zach Bolton -Joyce's best friend and potential love interest, stuff is quite awkward between them due to their undeclared love for each other, but otherwise they are great friends. Zach is very nice to everyone and is a bit of a stickler.

Always feel free to add more characters if you want!

Thank you and have fun reading!
